title: April 2018 Android Security Bulletin Partner Preview

vulnerabilities.tech_details: In ipa3_wwan_ioctl of msm/drivers/platform/msm/ipa/ipa_v2/rmnet_ipa.c there is a out of bound read due to missing bounds check. This could lead to information disclosure with System execution privilege. User interaction is not needed.
vulnerabilities.fix_details: The fix is designed to add a bounds check.

vulnerabilities.tech_details: In iw_softap_commit of drivers/staging/prima/CORE/HDD/src/wlan_hdd_hostapd.c there is a out of bounds write due to missing bounds check. This could lead to local escalation of privilege with system execution privilege. User interaction is not needed.
vulnerabilities.fix_details: The fix is designed to remove the entire function as it’s not being used.

vulnerabilities.tech_details: In the handleAttachmentUrisFromIntent() function of ComposeActivity.java, there is a possible denial of service due to improper input validation. This could lead to local denial of service by preventing the uninstallation of a malicious application with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation.
vulnerabilities.fix_details: The fix is designed to validate application label strings.

vulnerabilities.tech_details: In the nfc_hci_cmd_received() function of core.c, there is a possible out of bounds write due to a missing bounds check. This could lead to local escalation of privilege in the kernel with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation.
vulnerabilities.fix_details: The fix is designed to check the check the size of the incoming data buffer.

vulnerabilities.tech_details: In nl80211_set_wowlan of net/wireless/nl80211.c there is an out of bounds read due to improper bounds check. This could lead to information disclosure with system execution privilege. User interaction is not needed.
vulnerabilities.fix_details: The fix is designed to add validation policies to avoid the out of bounds read.

vulnerabilities.tech_details: In rmnet_usb_ctrl_init of drivers/net/usb/rmnet_usb_data.c there is a use after free. This could lead to information disclosure with system execution privilege. User interaction is not needed.
vulnerabilities.fix_details: The fix is designed to not reference the buffer if it’s freed.

vulnerabilities.tech_details: In ptt_sock_send_msg_to_app of file qcacld-2.0/CORE/SVC/src/ptt/wlan_ptt_sock_svc.c there is a out of bounds read due to missing bounds check. This could lead to information disclosure with System execution privilege. User interaction is not needed.
vulnerabilities.fix_details: The fix is designed to add bounds check.

vulnerabilities.tech_details: In the system UI, there is a possible crash if an "android:drawable" in an adaptive icon refers to itself.  This could lead to a local permanent denial of service, with no additional execution privileges needed.  User interaction is not required for exploitation.
vulnerabilities.fix_details: The fix is designed to change the stack overflow exception to prevent the crash.

vulnerabilities.tech_details: In M3UParser::parse of M3UParser.cpp, there is a memory resource exhaustion due to a large loop of pushing items into a vector. This could lead to remote denial of service with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is needed for exploitation.
vulnerabilities.fix_details: The fix is designed to detect variant streams without EXT-X-STREAM-INF in order to prevent the loop.

vulnerabilities.tech_details: In multiple functions of rmnet_ipa.c, there is a possible race condition due to insufficient locking.  This could lead to local escalation of privilege with System execution privileges required.  User interaction is not needed for exploitation.
vulnerabilities.fix_details: The fix is designed to add locking.

vulnerabilities.tech_details: In cdc_parse_cdc_header of message.c, there is a possible out of bounds read due to a missing bounds check. This could lead to local information disclosure with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation.
vulnerabilities.fix_details: The fix is designed to add several bounds checks.

vulnerabilities.tech_details: In hdd_debugfs_stats_update of drivers/staging/qcacld-3.0/core/hdd/src/wlan_hdd_debugfs_llstat.c, there is an out of bounds read due to a race condition between reading and releasing the debug_fs file resource. This could lead to information disclosure.
vulnerabilities.fix_details: The fix is designed to proper locking to avoid race conditions.

vulnerabilities.tech_details: In driver_override_store of pci-sysfs.c, there is a possible double free due to a race condition. This could lead to local escalation of privilege with System execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation.
vulnerabilities.fix_details: The fix is designed to add locking to avoid the race condition.

vulnerabilities.tech_details: In SvoxSsmlParser and startElement of svox_ssml_parser.cpp, there is a possible out of bounds write due to an uninitialized buffer.  This could lead to remote code execution in an unprivileged process with no additional execution privileges needed.  User interaction is not needed for exploitation.
vulnerabilities.fix_details: The fix is designed to initialize the buffer.

vulnerabilities.tech_details: In sdp_server_handle_client_req of sdp_server.cc, there is an out of bounds read due to a missing bounds check.  This could lead to local information disclosure with no additional execution privileges needed.  User interaction is not needed for exploitation.
vulnerabilities.fix_details: The fix is designed to add bounds checks.

vulnerabilities.tech_details: In avrc_pars_vendor_cmd of avrc_pars_tg.cc, there is a possible stack corruption due to a missing bounds check. This could lead to remote escalation of privilege with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation.
vulnerabilities.fix_details: The fix is designed to add a bounds check.

vulnerabilities.tech_details: In writeToParcel and readFromParcel of PeriodicAdvertisingReport.java, there is a permission bypass due to a 64/32bit int mismatch. This could lead to a local escalation of privilege where the user can start an activity with system privileges, with no additional execution privileges needed.  User interaction is not needed for exploitation.
vulnerabilities.fix_details: The fix is designed to fix the read/write mismatch.

vulnerabilities.tech_details: In writeToParcel and readFromParcel of OutputConfiguration.java, there is a permission bypass due to mismatched serialization. This could lead to a local escalation of privilege where the user can start an activity with system privileges, with no additional execution privileges needed.  User interaction is not needed for exploitation.
vulnerabilities.fix_details: The fix is designed to fix the parcel read/write mismatch.

vulnerabilities.tech_details: Speculative execution reading inaccessible memory could cause measurable changes in the cache state, allowing an attacker to use timing checks to determine the content of kernel memory.
vulnerabilities.fix_details: The fix is designed to unmap kernel memory while running in user mode.

vulnerabilities.tech_details: In updateLayerBounds of AdaptiveIconDrawable.java, there is a possible infinite loop due to improper input validation.  This could result in a local permanent denial of service, with no additional execution privileges needed.  User interaction is not required for exploitation.
vulnerabilities.fix_details: The fix is designed to not update layer bounds if the bounds are empty, preventing the crash and denial of service.

vulnerabilities.tech_details: In sctp_do_peeloff of socket.c, there is a possible escalation of privilege due to a use after free. This could lead to local escalation of privilege with System execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation.
vulnerabilities.fix_details: The fix is designed to fix the race condition by not peeling off from one netns to another one.

vulnerabilities.tech_details: In binder_transaction of binder.c, there is memory corruption due to a use after free.  This could lead to local escalation of privilege with no additional execution privileges needed.  User interaction is not needed for exploitation.
vulnerabilities.fix_details: The fix is designed to dequeue a node before freeing it.

vulnerabilities.tech_details: In wdsp_glink_open of wcd-dsp-glink.c, there is a possible use after free due to a race condition.  This could lead to local escalation of privilege with System execution privileges required.  User interaction is not needed for exploitation.
vulnerabilities.fix_details: The fix is designed to set wpriv->glink_state.link_state to prevent the race condition.

vulnerabilities.tech_details: In mnh_ion_create_buffer of mnh-sm-ion.c, there is a use after free due to improper locking. This could lead to escalation of privilege with System execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation.
vulnerabilities.fix_details: The fix is designed to add range and size checks and fix the locking.

vulnerabilities.tech_details: In writeToParcel and createFromParcel of RttManager.java, there is a permission bypass due to a write size mismatch. This could lead to a local escalation of privileges where the user can start an activity with system privileges, with no additional execution privileges needed.  User interaction is not needed for exploitation.
vulnerabilities.fix_details: The fix is designed to fix the read/write mismatch.

vulnerabilities.tech_details: In valid_master_desc of encrypted.c, there is an out of bounds read due to missing bounds check. This could lead to a local information disclosure with System execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation.
vulnerabilities.fix_details: The fix is designed to add bounds checks to avoid the out of bound read.

vulnerabilities.tech_details: In MediaPlayerService::Client::notify of MediaPlayerService.cpp, there is a possible use after free. This could lead to local escalation of privilege with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation.
vulnerabilities.fix_details: The fix is designed to fix the logic in order to avoid the user after free.

vulnerabilities.tech_details: In mnh_mipi_gen3_host of mnh-mipi.c, there is an out of bounds read due to an incorrect bounds check. This could lead to a local information disclosure with System execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation.
vulnerabilities.fix_details: The fix is designed to add bounds checks to avoid the out of bound read.

vulnerabilities.tech_details: In CProgramConfig_ReadHeightExt of tpdec_asc.cpp, there is a possible stack buffer overflow due to a missing bounds check. This could lead to a remote code execution with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is needed for exploitation.
vulnerabilities.fix_details: The fix is designed to add bounds checks to prevent the overflow.

vulnerabilities.tech_details: In wl_get_assoc_ies of wl_cfg80211.c, there is a possible out of bounds write due to an incorrect bounds check. This could lead to remote code execution with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation.
vulnerabilities.fix_details: The fix is designed to add appropriate bounds checks to avoid the out of bound writes.

vulnerabilities.tech_details: In config_set_string of config.cc, it is possible to pair a second BT keyboard without user approval due to improper input validation. This could lead to remote escalation of privilege with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation.
vulnerabilities.fix_details: The fix is designed to validate the configuration value.

vulnerabilities.tech_details: In getVSCoverage of CmapCoverage.cpp, there is a possible out of bounds read due to an incorrect bounds check. This could lead to local information disclosure with no additional privileges needed. User interaction is needed for exploitation.
vulnerabilities.fix_details: The fix is designed to fix the bounds check and avoid integer overflow.

vulnerabilities.tech_details: In ih264d_form_scaling_matrix_picture of ih264d_parse_slice.c, there is a null pointer dereference due to a missing initialization. This could lead to a remote denial of service with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is needed for exploitation.
vulnerabilities.fix_details: The fix is designed to avoid NULL pointer dereference.

vulnerabilities.tech_details: In ih264d_mv_pred_ref_tfr_nby2_pmb() of ih264d_parse_slice, there is an out of bound read due to a missing bounds check. This could lead to a remote denial of service with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is needed for exploitation.
vulnerabilities.fix_details: The fix is designed to prevent an out of bound read.

vulnerabilities.tech_details: In __netlink_deliver_tap_skb of af_netlink.c, it is possible to sniff Netlink activity across net namespaces due to a missing permission check. This could lead to local information disclosure with System execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation.
vulnerabilities.fix_details: The fix is designed to filter the traffic so that nlmon can only sniff netlink messages from its own netns.

vulnerabilities.tech_details: In wl_cfgvendor_priv_string_handler of wl_cfgvendor.c, there is a possible out of bounds read due to an incorrect bounds check. This could lead to local information disclosure with System execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation.
vulnerabilities.fix_details: The fix is designed to remove the wl_cfgvendor_priv_string_handler function.

vulnerabilities.tech_details: In the getHost() function of UriTest.java, there is the possibility of incorrect web origin determination. This could lead to incorrect security decisions with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation.
vulnerabilities.fix_details: The fix is designed to correct the handling of backslash characters in URIs.

vulnerabilities.tech_details:
In the FrameSequence_gif::FrameSequence_gif function of libframesequence, there is a out of bounds read due
to a missing bounds check.  This could lead to a remote denial of service with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation.
vulnerabilities.fix_details: The fix is designed to add a bounds check.

vulnerabilities.tech_details: In raw_sendmsg of raw.c, there is a possible uninitialized stack pointer usage due to a race condition. This could lead to local escalation of privilege with System execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation.
vulnerabilities.fix_details: The fix is designed to only read inet->hdrincl once in order to avoid the race.

vulnerabilities.tech_details: In wma_process_rmf_frame of wma_mgmt.c, there is a possible Out Of Bounds Write due to a missing bounds check. This could lead to remote code execution with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation.
vulnerabilities.fix_details: The fix is designed to add sanity check to drop the packet if mpdu_data_len is greater than 2000 bytes

vulnerabilities.tech_details: In diag_dci_notify_client of drivers/char/diag/diag_dci.c, there is a UAF issue due to missing validation of dci client's process descriptor. This could lead to UAF and causing EoP.
vulnerabilities.fix_details: The fix is designed to add the validation of dci client's process descriptor before issuing a signal to it.

vulnerabilities.tech_details: In wma_tbttoffset_update_event_handler of wma.c, there is a possible out of bound write due to an integer overflow. This could lead to local escalation of privilege with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation.
vulnerabilities.fix_details: The fix is designed to add sanity checks to make sure param_buf->num_tbttoffset_list does not exceed the value of the buffer.

vulnerabilities.tech_details: In wma_wow_wakeup_host_event of wma.c, there is a possible out of bound write due to a missing bounds check. This could lead to an elevation of privilege with system privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation.
vulnerabilities.fix_details: The fix is designed to add sanity check to make sure vdev_id is less than max_bssid before using it in wma_wow_wakeup_host_event.

vulnerabilities.tech_details: In wma_extscan_rsp_handler of wma.c, there is a possible out of bounds write due to a missing bounds check on event->vdev_id. This could lead to local escalation of privilege with System execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation.
vulnerabilities.fix_details: The fix is designed to add a bounds check.

vulnerabilities.tech_details: In wma_sap_ofl_add_sta_handler of QC WLAN driver, there is a possible OOB write due to a missing bounds check. This could lead to local escalation of privilege if the WLAN firmware is compromised.
vulnerabilities.fix_details: The fix is designed to add a bounds check to sta_add_event->data_len to avoid the OOB write.

vulnerabilities.tech_details: In wma_populate_soc_caps of wma_main.c, there is a possible out of bounds write due to an integer overflow caused by too big value of num_hw_modes or num_phy. This could lead to local escalation of privilege with System execution privileges required.  User interaction is not needed for exploitation.
vulnerabilities.fix_details: The fix is designed to add bounds checks to both variables.

vulnerabilities.tech_details: In wma_vdev_start_resp_handler of wma_dev_if.c, there is a possible out of bounds write if firmware sends a response with too big resp_event->vdev_id. This could lead to local escalation of privilege with System execution privileges required.  User interaction is not needed for exploitation.
vulnerabilities.fix_details: The fix is designed to add a bounds check.

vulnerabilities.tech_details: In wma_beacon_swba_handler of wma_mgmt.c, there is a possible out of bounds write if firmware sends a message with invalid vdev_map value. This could lead to local escalation of privilege with System execution privileges required.  User interaction is not needed for exploitation.
vulnerabilities.fix_details: The fix is designed to fix the bounds checks in the for loop that causes the out of bounds write.

vulnerabilities.tech_details: In msm_ispif_get_pack_mask_from_cfg of drivers/media/platform/msm/camera_v2/ispif/msm_ispif.c, there is a possible out of bounds read due to a missing bounds check. This could lead to local information disclosure with System execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation.
vulnerabilities.fix_details: The fix is designed to add bounds check.

vulnerabilities.tech_details: In ihevcd_decode of ihevcd_decode.c there is a possible resource exhaustion due to an infinite loop. This could lead to a denial of service with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is needed for exploitation.
vulnerabilities.fix_details: The fix is designed to move the update of sps_id in ps_codec to the end of the function to ensure sps is completely parsed to avoid the infinite loop.

vulnerabilities.tech_details: In avrc_pars_browsing_cmd of avrc_pars_tg.cc, there is a possible stack buffer overflow due to an incorrect bounds check. This could lead to remote code execution with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation.
vulnerabilities.fix_details: The fix is designed to fix the bounds check.

vulnerabilities.tech_details: In avrc_ctrl_pars_vendor_rsp of avrc_pars_ct.cc, there is a possible stack buffer overflow due to a missing bounds check. This could lead to remote code execution with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation.
vulnerabilities.fix_details: The fix is designed to add a bounds check.

vulnerabilities.tech_details: In avrc_ctrl_pars_vendor_rsp of bluetooth avrcp_ctrl, there is a possible out of bounds write on the stack due to a missing bounds check. This could lead to remote code execution with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation.
vulnerabilities.fix_details: The fix is designed to add a bounds check.

vulnerabilities.tech_details: In avrc_ctrl_pars_vendor_rsp of avrc_pars_ct.cc, there is a possible NULL pointer dereference due to missing bounds checks. This could lead to remote denial of service with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation.
vulnerabilities.fix_details: The fix is designed to add bounds checks.

vulnerabilities.tech_details: In createFromParcel of VerifyCredentialResponse.java, there is a possible invalid parcel read due to improper input validation. This could lead to local escalation of privilege if mPayload in writeToParcel were null, with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation.
vulnerabilities.fix_details: The fix is designed to fix the read/write mismatch.

vulnerabilities.tech_details: In ihevcd_parse_slice_header of libhevc, there is a possible out of bounds read due to a missing bounds check. This could lead to remote denial of service with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is needed for exploitation.
vulnerabilities.fix_details: The fix is designed to add a bounds check.

vulnerabilities.tech_details: In the handleAttachmentUrisFromIntent() function of ComposeActivity.java, there is a confused deputy that can be used to compose an email with a file attachment from another message. This could lead to local information disclosure of local files with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is needed for exploitation.
vulnerabilities.fix_details: The fix is designed to prevent Compose from accepting URIs with bad attachment paths.

vulnerabilities.tech_details: In FindNAL of avc_utils.cpp there is a possible out of bounds read due to a missing bounds check. This could lead to remote denial of service with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is needed for exploitation.
vulnerabilities.fix_details: The fix is designed to add a bounds check.

vulnerabilities.tech_details: In ihevcd_fmt_conv of ihevcd_fmt_conv.c, there is a possible out of bounds write due to a missing bounds check. This could lead to remote code execution with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is needed for exploitation.
vulnerabilities.fix_details: The fix is designed to add a bounds check.

vulnerabilities.tech_details: In apr_cb_func of apr.c and apr_vm_cb_process_evt of apr_vm.c, there is a possible arbitrary code execution due to a missing bounds check. This could lead to local escalation of privilege with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation.
vulnerabilities.fix_details: The fix is designed to add appropriate bounds checks on the APR port received from the ADSP.

vulnerabilities.tech_details: In wma_extscan_hotlist_match_event_handler of wma_scan_roam.c, there is a possible out of bounds write due to an incorrect bounds check. This could lead to local escalation of privilege with System execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation.
vulnerabilities.fix_details: The fix is designed to add proper bounds checking.

vulnerabilities.tech_details: In htt_t2h_lp_msg_handler of core/dp/htt/htt_t2h.c, there is a possible OOB write due to a missing bounds check. This could lead to local escalation of privilege with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation.
vulnerabilities.fix_details: The fix is designed to add a bounds check.

vulnerabilities.tech_details: In __wlan_hdd_cfg80211_add_key of wlan_hdd_cfg80211.c, there is a remote bypass of user interaction requirements due to improperly used crypto. This could lead to remote bypass of user interaction requirements with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation.
vulnerabilities.fix_details: The fix is designed to propagate the key sequence counter to SME.

vulnerabilities.tech_details: In process_tx_info of core/utils/pktlog/pktlog_internal.c, there is a possible out of bounds write due to a missing bounds check. This could lead to local escalation of privilege with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation.
vulnerabilities.fix_details: The fix is designed to add input size check and limit the size in memory copy operation.

vulnerabilities.tech_details: In ProcSetReqInternal of cfgProcMsg.c, there is a possible out of bounds write due to a missing bounds check. This could lead to local escalation of privilege with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation.
vulnerabilities.fix_details: The fix is designed to validate a length variable to ensure it does not exceed CFG_MAX_STR_LEN.

vulnerabilities.tech_details: In ol_rx_frag_indication_handler of CORE/CLD_TXRX/HTT/htt_t2h.c, there is a possible OOB write due to an unusual root cause. This could lead to local escalation of privilege with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation.
vulnerabilities.fix_details: The fix is designed to add a bounds check.

vulnerabilities.tech_details: In __ipa_del_hdr of drivers/platform/msm/ipa/ipa_hdr.c, there is a possible arbitrary local code execution due to a use after free. This could lead to local escalation of privilege with System execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation.
vulnerabilities.fix_details: The fix is designed to add proper validations to avoid use after free.

vulnerabilities.tech_details: In wma_extscan_hotlist_match_event_handler of core/wma/src/wma_scan_roam.c, there is a possible OOB write due to a missing bounds check. This could lead to local escalation of privilege with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation.
vulnerabilities.fix_details: The fix is designed to add a bounds check.

vulnerabilities.tech_details: In wma_unified_radio_tx_power_level_stats_event_handler of core/wma/src/wma_utils.c, there is a possible OOB write due to a missing bounds check. This could lead to local escalation of privilege with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation.
vulnerabilities.fix_details: The fix is designed to add a bounds check.
